participant_1.background:
I have lots of friends and can hold a conversation easily.
I wish i could be more serious about school.
I get distracted easily.

participant_2.background:
I work at a museum.
I don t have a lot of friends.
I read a lot.
I like to go to the park.

content.text: Hi there, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, go to the park, and play video games.
That's cool, I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different genres, but I'm really into fantasy and historical fiction right now.
Me too! I love a good fantasy novel. Do you have any favorite authors?
I love Brandon Sanderson and Patrick Rothfuss. What about you?
I love Sanderson too! I'm also a big fan of Robin Hobb.
Oh, I love Robin Hobb too! I've read all of the Farseer Trilogy and I'm on the second book in the Liveship Traders trilogy.
I'm a little jealous, I'm only on the first book of the Farseer Trilogy.
It's so good! I'm sure you'll love it.
I hope so! I'm excited to read more of her books.
Me too! She's one of my favorite authors.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to go to the park and play video games.
I like to play video games too! What games do you like to play?
I like a lot of different games, but I'm really into open world games right now.
Me too! I love exploring and finding new things in open world games.
Me too! I think they're the best kind of games.
I agree. They're so much fun.
Yeah, they are.
